content.text: Complete final page of Seymour's handwritten account

text_sections.full_transcription:
[crossed out: After my wife]

I applied for the OK DOT job in
1952. I waited until May 4 16- 1956
for the Job. I then Started working
for the Board DEPT. Service until July
Park in the DISTRICT IN E. ST A BKLYN
I enjoyed working for the Park-DEPT-
[crossed out line]

I started working for a General Berkin
in 1946 - selling - Sporting Goods - Electric Trains.
I stayed in [unclear] for about 2 years.
I also worked for Macy's Altman City Lamp
until 1950 - Then I got an Infection on
my arm conducted in the L.R.T. [?] lasted
until 1951 - when I met my Love Wife
Paula — MY JUDY WHY WIFE GAVE
BIRTH TO A SON JEFFREY. THEN
My Wife [?] She BIRTH TO 5 on to Mark -
August 1954 July 14 - We were in the
country — where I didn't hear good
on the bus — so 1956 HOME. W. Ben. I checked
here I had the 1ST HEART ATTACK on
May 31st 1983 — While in the HOSPITAL
I had my 2nd HEART TRACK —
I stayed in CITY HOSPITAL —
INTENSIVE CARE. THE conditions IN THE
WARD WAS SO HORRIBLE THAT MY

HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_000030

insights: Applied for DOT job 1952, waited until May 4, 1956 to get it
Board DEPT Service job, then Park Department in Brooklyn
'I enjoyed working for the Park-DEPT' - found satisfaction
1946: Worked for General Berkin selling sporting goods, electric trains
Also worked at Macy's and Altman City Lamp until 1950
L.R.T. infection on arm lasted until 1951
'MY JUDY WHY WIFE GAVE BIRTH TO A SON JEFFREY'
Confusion: 'JUDY' may be typo for 'July' or confused memory
Second heart attack while in hospital
Text cuts off mid-sentence about hospital conditions
Handwriting shows severe deterioration and confusion
Multiple job history shows working class struggle

crossed_out: Text at top of page crossed out

forensic_notes: CRITICAL: Jeffrey's birth year not stated but implied 1953
Mark's birth given as 'August 1954 July 14' - confused
Hospital story from 1983 - 20 years before birthday book
This appears to be old document included posthumously
investigative_leads: Identify which NYC hospital treated Seymour
Determine actual date of Seymour's death
